subject: Football
Concussions
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Robinson, a former player for four N.F.L. teams who killed himself in May at 25, had a brain disease that has been linked to repeated blows to the head, researchers confirmed Wednesday.
snippet: Robinson, a former player for four N.F.L. teams who killed himself in May at 25, had a brain disease that has been linked to repeated blows to the head, researchers confirmed Wednesday.
